a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Carbon intensity of electricity generation, 2000 to 2024

Carbon intensity is measured in grams of
carbon dioxide-equivalents
emitted per
kilowatt-hour
of electricity
Data source: Ember (2025); Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024)
